snippet.title: Dragon's Dogma Official Trailer
snippet.description:
http://facebook.com/dragonsdogma - Here is the Official Trailer for CAPCOM'S Dragon's Dogma, a new Action RPG from the maker's of Devil May Cry 3 and 4.

With a May 2012 release, this is an action game that Capcom game designer Hideaki Itsuno has wanted to make for years.
